name: Real City Sniper War FPS Shoot
name_original: Real City Sniper War FPS Shoot
description:
Sniper Assassin Shooter is a striking action FPS sniper game! True 3D graphics and sound effects, allowing you to experience the real sniper experience.Sniper shooter ready to attack on dangerous terrorists game you have to protect your city from contract killer and become a war hero IN bravo army sniper shooter game. In this game you are a regiment and your duty is to protect yourself and your city from brutal deadly enemies of shooter. You
are a sniper shooter to play a role as a real army commando and fight against the perilous enemies . war has been started and you are in battle fight against criminal like real gangsters of top shooter.

FEATURES
- Big variety of missions
- Realistic 3D shooting and effects
- Cunning Enemies
- Rich Task Function
